Articles.Content:
When the camera switches automatically, or even when I switch the camera modes manually, I often witness a "grand tour" around my ship after which I am looking at my ship from a very different angle than before.

As long as all camera modes allow looking at the ship from all directions, I suggest making these transitions less intrusive - the game could recalculate camera parameters so the general direction stays the same, only camera roll changes. Because in almost all cases, the reason why I am switching between camera modes is because I have no control over its roll and I want to change that.

Okay... that was quick. I only noticed it today but camera changes are now exactly how I suggested in this thread. I guess it must have been in the game already because I only posted this the day before release. Anyway - thank you Squad, really appreciated!
